Thank you for registering your business at the Beauty Kingdom Awards.

Your business will be assessed by our committee, and if you become a FINALIST, we will invite you to the Gala Dinner on April 22, 2023 in London, Commerce Rd. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. We wish you good luck. Beauty Kingdom Awards team
